topic.title: Discuss (U1): Rocks and Minerals
topic.text:
This chapter can lead to the seemingly strange statement: "All rocks are minerals, but all minerals are not rocks."

Based on the information you read:

  • Identify one rock and one mineral you encounter daily.
  • Describe how and where you encounter each, and identify how each may or may not be important to your daily life.

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
